Welcome to Braves World. A blog dedicated to the Atlanta Braves season. I will post, game recaps, scores, injuries the whole nine yards as the season goes on. I will start completley on Tuesday

THE LAKERS ARE BACK IN THE FINALS!!!!!!!!after the lakers 3peat they were snubbed from the finals by the spurs twice but now after the lakers just beat the minnesota timberwolves the lakers are back in the finals. They will mostly likeley face detroit but i have been wrong before

Ugh its back to school tomorow. I have had a four day weekend which was boring most of the time but it still is better than school. The good news is this is my last 3 days of school and they are all half days. Tomorow i have my pe and biology final. Wendseday i have my history and English final. Finally on Thursday i have my algebra and automotive technology final and thats it for 3 months w00t!
Well i will be starting my 2nd blog now. It is called Braves World and it will update everyone on every things that Goes on with the Atlanta Braves. Enjoy!http://bravesworld.blogspot.com/

Buddy Rice won the Indy 500 today. he is the first pole winner to win the indy 500 since 1997. The race was delayed many times due to the rain. I'll admit that hate nascar i like to watch drag racing and irl i just think irl is more intresting than nascar it is more international and me being mexican that draws more intrest to me.

Well, My Atlanta Braves lost to the phillies today 4-1, they are now under .500 for the season. The kid they brought up to pitch today for Ramirez faired pretty well but of course the Braves provided little offense attack scoring only one run. Chipper was out again after he was hit by a pitch in the knee two nights ago. Mike Hessman is also playing first for LaRoche.This will be very intresting to see if the braves can continue there run at first place. It will be a challenge for them but i have faith in the best manager Bobby Cox and the Best GM John Schurholtz to pull them through this. When Chipper and Giles finally get helathy hopefully they will make a run for first again.

Hopefully i will get to see the day after tomorow maybe tomorow or sometime soon beacuse i have herd nothing but great things about this movie.
